articles.title: Foreign Ministry Blasts Israeli FM as Imbecile
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Blasts Israeli FM as Imbecile
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Saturday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA denouncing the foreign minister of Israel for recently daring list someone as part of "the axis of evil":
					 The Israeli foreign minister, when referring to the issue of the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction during his visit to Japan, took issue with other countries with unspeakable vulgar words.
					
					 What merits attention is that Israeli Foreign Minister Lieberman is an icon of Zionists and a typical ultra-rightist. He is an imbecile in diplomacy as he is foreign minister in name only.
					
					 Unprecedentedly stronger voices denouncing Israel for laying a stumbling block in the way of making the Middle East a nuclear-free zone are heard from the NPT review conference.
					
					 For its expansion of Jewish settlements Israel is being rebuffed and condemned worldwide as a harasser of peace and security challenging the Mideast peace process and driven into a tight corner.  
					
					 Lieberman's shameless remarks were prompted by his intention to get rid of it. 
					
					 The DPRK has nothing to do with any spread of WMDs. It will never pardon Israel for daring slander the dignified DPRK by faking up sheer lies despite the fact that it has a nuclear arsenal enough to exterminate the Arab nation.
					
					 Israel would be well advised to abandon its bad habit of liking to slander others, pull out of the occupied Arab territories at once and unconditionally meet the international demand for turning the Mideast into a nuclear-free zone.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Goodluck Ebele Jonathan on his assumption of office as president of Nigeria.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Nigeria would continue to grow stronger in different fields, the message wished the president a great success in his work for consolidating the national unity and political stability and achieving socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Conveys Sympathy to Dutch FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Conveys Sympathy to Dutch FM
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of condolences to Maxime Verhagen, foreign minister of the caretaker government of the Netherlands, as regards the recent airplane crash in Libya that claimed its citizens.
					 Pak in the message extended deep sympathy and condolences to him and, through him, to the victims and bereaved families.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Delegations of China, Germany, Mongolia, Singapore and Taipei of China arrived here Saturday by air and train to participate in the 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.
					 Arriving earlier were delegations of Russia, Austria and Italy.
					
					 On the same day a friendship delegation of the Jilin Yuwen Middle School led by Principal He Manli came here.

articles.title: DPRK Seething with News of Kim Jong Il's Visit to China
articles.content:
DPRK Seething with News of Kim Jong Il's Visit to China
Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have been excited over the news of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to China.
					The news was highlighted by all the newspapers of the country on May 7 and 8.
					
					 Mass media have dealt with his China visit every day and, from May 12, documentary films about it have been telecasted repeatedly by the request of viewers.
					
					 Seeing his energetic external activities in the films the Korean people, including the servicepersons, pay a tribute to him, who made a long journey for the country and the people and for the development of friendship with China.
					
					 They are also resolved to work devotedly for the building of a thriving nation under his leadership.

articles.title: Rice transplanting Begins
articles.content:
Rice transplanting Begins
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Rice transplanting began across the country.
					 Rice transplanting started on co-op farms in South Hwanghae Province including the Sambong Cooperative Farm in Kangryong County in the wake of its kick-off on the Wonhwa Cooperative Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, and the Chongsan Cooperative Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					
					 From its very start the rice transplanting is making brisk headway on those farms which have grown healthy rice seedlings despite unprecedentedly bad weather.
					
					 Watering, harrowing, leveling, etc. are kept ahead of other work and rice transplanting machines are working in full capacity, steadily expanding the area of paddies every day. Additional planting of rice seedlings is being pushed forward simultaneously.

articles.title: Materials Added to Metro Construction Museum
articles.content:
Materials Added to Metro Construction Museum
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Many more historic materials and relics dealing with revolutionary exploits performed by the peerlessly great men for the construction of the Pyongyang Metro have been added to the Metro Construction Museum over the last decade. 
					 Among them are "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Meeting with Builders of Metro", "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung on Electric Car" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Giving Field Guidance to Kwangbok Station" and other photographs showing the noble images of the peerlessly great men. 
					
					 Also on display are a cup into which Kim Il Sung poured wine of toast for a hero who participated in the construction of the metro, a design of mosaic examined by Kim Jong Il and other historic relics and collections of works dealing with the construction of the metro. 
					
					 Among the exhibits are a carbide lamp used by Kim Il Sung when providing field guidance to a construction site and other relics, many photographs and newspaper clippings dealing with the heroic fighting spirit and indomitable mettle displayed by builders of the metro. 
					
					 The museum has multi-media dealing with the history of the guidance provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and feats performed by the builders.

articles.title: Actions for End to Traitorous Rule in S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Actions for End to Traitorous Rule in S. Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative forces including the "Grand National Party" are now making desperate efforts to put all the local power bodies under their control through the "elections to the local self-governing bodies". This is a blatant challenge to independence and democratization of the south Korean society and the cause of national reunification as it is nothing but a rash act to turn back the cloak of history. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 Due to the dictatorial rule enforced by the conservative group under the signboard of "pragmatism", even the elementary success made by the south Korean people in democratization at the cost of blood has been seriously bungled and the society is returning to the past horrible era of fascist dictatorship, the article notes. 
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the moves of the conservative group to escalate the confrontation with compatriots are throwing great hurdles in the way of achieving national reconciliation and unity and the reunification of the country. 
					
					 The prevailing situation underscores the urgent necessity to make a clean sweep of the group of traitors in south Korea hell-bent on the anti-reunification actions and confrontation in order to mend the strained inter-Korean relations and advance the cause of national reunification, the article stressed. 
					
					 The south Korean people's resentment against the ruling forces is running high, the article says, and continues: The anti-conservative sentiment is growing strong in the political camp including the opposition parties as they are disillusioned with the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the dictatorship veiled with the word of "pragmatism." 
					
					 Various circles have the same desire and goal to eliminate the conservative forces from the political arena and their spirit and will to fight are sky-high. 
					
					 Unity serves as a powerful weapon in actions and a guarantee for victory. When different political parties and organizations in south Korea and broad strata of its people desirous of independence, democracy and reunification form a grand alliance against the conservatives and take joint actions, they can surely emerge victorious in the above-said elections no matter how desperately the conservative ruling forces may work, concludes the article.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- At least 5,000 members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally in Seoul on May 12 in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to suppress it.
					 Speakers at the rally accused the "government" and the business side of holding negotiations on May 11 at which they decided to implement the "Law on Trade Unions" which had been retrogressively revised to ban the payment of wages to the full-time union leaders.
					
					 They declared totally null and void any agreement concluded at the negotiations without presence of the KCTU.
					
					 They denounced the authorities for leaving no means untried to suppress trade unions they consider obstructive to their stay in power and stated that all the people would turn out in the actions against the evil law on labor.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally. It said that the KCTU would wage a dynamic all-out struggle in June to shatter the authorities' suppression of the labor movement, have the "Law on Trade Unions" revised again and win the basic rights of the workers.
					
					 The workers will certainly judge the present "government" and the "Grand National Party" in the forthcoming "elections to the local self-governing bodies" in solidarity with peasants, youth and students and people of all other strata, the resolution declared.

articles.title: Behavior of Dictatorial Power Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Behavior of Dictatorial Power Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea, in a statement on May 11, accused the "Election Management Committee" of unreasonably patronizing the dictatorial power. 
					 The statement slammed the "committee" for branding the actions conducted by the progressive forces against the unpopular rule of the "government", including its policy on the projects for "improving the four large rivers", as illegal ones.
					
					 It queried what is difference between the present situation where a mere talk about the "four large rivers" is liable to suppression and the situation at the time of the "March 15 fraudulent election" by the preceding dictatorial forces where the government power-dominated election was rampant. 
					
					 The statement charged that the "committee" is hell-bent on crackdown upon the dissident forces in a bid to create conditions favorable for the GNP while openly patronizing the dictatorial regime.

articles.title: S.Korean Committee Blasts Puppet Authority
articles.content:
S.Korean Committee Blasts Puppet Authority
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement issued on May 10 denounced the puppet authorities for viciously standing in the way of the reunification movement of the fellow countrymen.
					 The statement accused the "government" of "disallowing" members of the organization to participate in a working contact of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 The persistent actions taken by the authorities to block working contacts for non-governmental exchange between the south and the north and the successful holding of the joint national event are aimed at bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse, it held, declaring:
					
					 Such act of treachery on the part of the "government" as inciting tension and confrontation only are intolerable.

articles.title: DPRK Art Exhibition Opens in Italy
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Blasts Israeli FM as Imbecile
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A fine art exhibition on the theme of "Painters of Pyongyang" opened with due ceremony at a museum in Treviso, Italy, on May 7 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Italy.
					Displayed in its venue are books on the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and more than 100 Korean fine art pieces.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were personages of the Italy-DPRK Cultural Association and the Treviso City Office and masses of different circles. Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Italy and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The vice-mayor of Treviso said that the exhibition would offer Italians an opportunity to see for themselves the Korean fine art developing with each passing day under the care of the party and government of the DPRK, and expressed the will to make every possible effort to develop the friendly relations with the Korean people.
					
					  The chairman of the above-said association said that the exhibition would provide an important occasion in widely introducing Korean culture and further strengthening the development of relationship between the two countries. 
					
					 After looking round the exhibits, visitors lavished praises, saying that Korean fine art is fascinating for its exquisite, graceful and unique nature. 
					
					 The exhibition will last till June 6.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX de RPDC denuncia al canciller israeli
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX de RPDC denuncia al canciller israeli
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ATCC) -- A las preguntas presentadas por la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con que recientemente, el canciller israeli se atrevio a cuestionar a alguien como "eje de los males", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 15 como sigue:
					Refiriendose al problema de la proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo, el canciller israeli, Lieberman, de visita en Japon, provoco a otros paises con las palabras que nadie quiere.
					
					El es prototipo sionista y ultraderechista representativo. Tambien, aunque es canciller, es muy inepto en la diplomacia.
					
					Ahora, en la conferencia de examen de ejecucion de NPT se elevan sin precedentes las voces de denuncia a Israel que deviene obstaculo principal en realizar la desnuclearizacion del Oriente Medio. 
					
					Ademas, Israel se ve en apuros siendo censurado y repudiado por el mundo como perturbador de la paz y la seguridad que desafia al proceso de la paz del Oriente Medio debido a sus maniobras de expansion de ghettos. Por lo tanto, tales palabras de Lieberman son para evitarlo.
					
					La RPDC no tiene que ver nada con la proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo. No perdonaremos jamas a Israel que se atrevio a calumniar con falsedad a la digna RPDC aun sentandose sobre el polvorin nuclear muy suficiente para exterminar la nacion arabe.
					
					Israel debe abandonar los vicios de cuestionar sin ton ni son a otros, retirarse de inmediato de la tierra arabe ya ocupada y aceptar incondicionalmente la demanda internacional alusiva a la desnuclearizacion del Medio Oriente.

articles.title: Corea bulle de noticia conmovedora
articles.content:
Corea bulle de noticia conmovedora
 Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ATCC) -- Ahora, al enterarse de la noticia de historica visita a China del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, en todos los lugares de Corea reina plenamente el sentimiento de respeto y veneracion hacia el.
					 Rodong Sinmun, Minju Joson, Chongnyon Jonwi, Hamnam Ilbo, Phyongbuk Ilbo y otros periodicos centrales y locales transmitieron a la vez los dias 7 y 8 las informaciones sobre tal noticia. 
					
					Las publicaciones redactan diariamente esta noticia y a partir de la noche del dia 12 se proyectan los documentales sobre dicha visita por la TV segun la demanda unanime de los televidentes.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que se enteraron de esa noticia sobre las dinamicas actividades exteriores del Dirigente, no contienen el sentimiento de cordial agradecimiento hacia el quien realizo tal visita para la patria y el pueblo, para el fortalecimiento de la tradicional amistad Corea-China.
					
					Ellos toman la decision de dedicar todo lo suyo para la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista recordando la gran imagen del gran hombre sin par quien volvera a seguir el camino de abnegacion patriotica sin quitar la fatiga acumulada en los dias de visita al extranjero.

articles.title: En Corea iniciado transplante de posturas de arroz
articles.content:
En Corea iniciado transplante de posturas de arroz 
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ATCC) -- Comenzo en Corea el transplante de las posturas de arroz. 
					Tomaron la delantera en esta faena la Granja Cooperativa de Wonhwa del distrito de Phyongwon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y la de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho. 
					
					Las siguen otras granjas de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur incluso la Granja Cooperativa de Sambong del distrito de Kangryong. 
					
					A pesar de las condiciones meteorologicas inusualmente desfavorables, los granjeros transplantan con mucho entusiasmo las posturas fuertes cultivadas por si mismos. 
					
					Anteponen las labores preparatorias como el riego, el gradeo, la nivelacion de arrozales, etc. y elevan la tasa de funcionamiento de las maquinas trasplantadoras de las posturas. De esta manera, incrementan cada dia mas las areas de posturas transplantadas y realizan por otra parte el transplante secundario para llenar los vacios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por poner fin a dominacion traidora
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por poner fin a dominacion traidora 
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ATCC) -- En el Sur de Corea las fuerzas conservadoras incluyendo el "Gran Partido Nacional" maniobran desesperadamente para tomar en su mano todos los poderes locales con motivo de las "elecciones de autonomia local", lo cual es acto antihistorico para dar marcha atras a la manecilla de la historia y deviene un grave desafio a la realizacion de la independencia y la democracia de la sociedad surcoreana y de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 15 y continua:
					
					 Debido a la dominacion dictatorial "pragmatica" de la banda conservadora, estan pisoteados despiadadamente hasta los exitos elementales de la democratizacion conquistada por los pobladores surcoreanos y la sociedad vuelve a la terrible epoca de dictadura fascista del pasado.
					
					 Las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de la banda conservadora crean grandes obstaculos en la lucha por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La situacion creada presenta la necesidad de eliminar en el Sur de Corea la banda de traidores enloquecidos en la confrontacion anti-reunificacion para mejorar las empeoradas relaciones Norte-Sur y llevar adelante la causa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ahora, llega al climax la colera de los surcoreanos contra las fuerzas gobernantes.
					
					Se torna mas elevado el ambiente contra las fuerzas conservadoras en el circulo politico incluyendo los partidos de oposicion desilusionados al despotismo y a la arbitrariedad de la dictadura "pragmatica".
					
					Coinciden la aspiracion y la demanda de distintos sectores tendentes a expulsar las fuerzas conservadoras de la escena politica. Tambien estan muy firmes la voluntad de lucha y el espiritu de ellos. 
					
					La unidad es la potente arma de la lucha y la garantia del triunfo.
					
					Por muy desesperadas que sean las maniobras de las fuerzas conservadoras en el poder, los partidos politicos, las entidades y amplios habitantes del Sur de Corea que desean la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion podran lograr con certeza el triunfo en las "elecciones de autonomia local" si toman acciones conjuntas formando la gran alianza contra las fuerzas conservadoras.
